duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to drive revenues and expand customer base.
Lead a team of sales specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies.
Forecast sales targets and develop plans to meet or exceed them.
Negotiate and close deals, ensuring favorable terms for the company while meeting customer needs.
Utilize digital marketing tools and communication channels to enhance sales outreach and lead generation.
Measure and report on the performance of sales campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
